title: Rapid and quantitative detection of DNA hybridization using a simplified Fabry–Perot interferometric biosensor
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13367-13373
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01390E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xin Shi, Yanhong Ma, Yipeng Liao, Hoi Lut Ho
The simple-structured Fabry–Perot interferometric biosensor is capable of rapid and quantitative detection of DNA hybridization.
